name: Amazing Baguio w/ Rizza
description: The special about this trip is, I learned some ways of conserving water, how to treat myself when I feel poop, (Sorry :( , I do fell this because of their climate there. I am not efficient at that time). I also learn how to sail a boat and to pick/harvest some strawberry at the farm. And last,  I learned how to be contented at all times.
